product-info.opis: Tekoče milo za roke kožo temeljito očisti, jo z oljnim kompleksom in izvlečkom grozdja obenem neguje ter pomaga ščititi pred prezgodnjim staranjem. Kože ne izsuši. - ANTI-AGEING- grape extract & rich oil complex- skin-friendly pH- paraben, paraffin & silicone FREE

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract, Niacinamide, Silica, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Parfum, Citric Acid, Octocrylene, Homosalate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, CI 42051, CI 18050

contact-information.kontakt:: Kozmetika Afrodita d.o.o., Kidričeva 54, 3250 Rogaška Slatina, Slovenija
